snx.framework

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • snx.framework.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Game1

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    By Waffalz The base class for games, including game looping and drawing

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Called to start up important game things, separate from the constructor

      • loadContent

        public void loadContent()
        Called when content needs to be loaded. Might need to be called to later, but is mainly used to be overridden by Game1

      • unloadContent

        public void unloadContent()
        Called when content needs to be unloaded. Might need to be called to later, but is mainly used to be overridden by Game1

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts the game loop

      • update

        public void update(GameTime time)
        Called to a number of times every second to maintain... stuff Overridden by subclasses to do their own update things
        Parameters:
        time - The current GameTime as of the time the method is called

      • refreshScreen

        public void refreshScreen(GameTime gameTime)
        calls to draw, and implements double buffering to prevent screen tearing also adds a frame rate counter, which is nice
        Parameters:
        gameTime - The current GameTime as of the time the method is called

      • draw

        public void draw(GameTime time)
        called to when graphics are to be handled
        Parameters:
        time - The current GameTime as of the time the method is called

        Kills the game
